title: hello my friends
body:
hi, just wondering how everyone is? this is simply just a thread to say hi, check up on everyone and have a good time, please reply in the following format: ( I put my answers next to them too)

how are you? : (answer) 

a little bit about yourself: (answer)

do you support riot?: (answer)

what are your thoughts on league of legends recent changes?:(answer)

do you miss the old forums?: (answer)

and an optional question:

are u free on saturday nights for lots of frightz: (answer)

anyway hope everyone has a great night

replies.body: goddamnit you're going to start posting here aren't you.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8jcr9r8M,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-06-15T01:34:04.743+0000)
>
> goddamnit you're going to start posting here aren't you.

ah, this meme
hi, i have not liked boards but i have deciced to make the switch

how are you? : well

a little bit about yourself: league

do you support riot?: oui

what are your thoughts on league of legends recent changes?: good

do you miss the old forums?: no

and an optional question: are you well? yes

are u free on saturday nights for lots of frightz: yes

yes

how are you? : good, thanks.

a little bit about yourself: i'm bad at this game. Also, transfered over from EUW after getting married.

do you support riot?: i suppose as a wrenchman i should. or just that people expect me to. truth being, i gave shit to rito when they deserved it, just... i guess i was a bit more productive in my rants than most :P

what are your thoughts on league of legends recent changes?: i don't consider myself good enough to argument on the changes, but i can see there's a few pointed changes in the last few months to nudge out the tanky domination and smooth out the new items. i appreciate that, but it might take a bit more.

do you miss the old forums?: some parts yes. others no. for example the whole reddit style, i find awful. but oh gawd moderating is so much easier now.

are u free on saturday nights for lots of frightz: um wut.
